summary: Inspired by true events, the life of Father Mario Pantaleo, a Priest born in Pistoia, Italy, and based in Argentina, who guided by the mysteries of the faith, had "powers" to diagnose and heal diseases through the imposition of hands.
cast: Graciela Borges|Armonía Borrás|Jorge Marrale|Carlos Weber|Yoska Lázaro|Carlos Portaluppi|Carlos Defeo|Gerardo Otero|Luciana Calarota|Lautaro Perotti|Héctor Quiroga|Jean Pierre Reguerraz|Ronald Dunke|María Socas|Daniel Valenzuela|Gloria Ramírez|María Inés Sancerni|Velia Chávez|Lía Cynsgiser|Belén Blanco|Ruth Dobel|Gustavo Ferrari|Constanza Casas|Jorge Castaño|Juan Sebastián Cruz|Horacio Peña|Alberto Ajak|Mónica Cabrera|Alejo Mango|Esteban Pérez|Remedios Piedrabuena|Marta Riveros|Duilio Marzio|Néstor Ducó|Gabriela Sae|Sergio Aysemberg|Paula Sartor|Michel Noher|Luis Carbajal|Víctor Maldonado|Ismael Eliazur|Rodolfo Soto|Josep Maria Pou|Ágatha Fresco|Roberta Pasquinucci|Vicky Peña|Jade Fresco|Leandro Finger|Brenda Gandini|Jackie Parisier|Sebastián Hermida|Nora Alicia Arraga|Fabiana García Lago|Juan Carlos Gené|Carolina Levi
title: Las manos
